tweets.text: I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

@A_S_G I live 5 miles away and can smell it there most days. I smell it when I shop, get fuel, exercise and when I work. I lodged a complaint with the Environment Agency who were helpful and did my part to #StopTheStink https://t.co/GU4XnyBQDS

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA  You allowed this to happen. You could stop this but choose not to. Can you explain why? @JuliaHB1 @Iromg @BBCPanorama @C4Dispatches @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #StopTheStink #LandfillStillStinks #WalleysQuarry https://t.co/r5Mkbohc0w

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @stopthestink I don‚Äôt think people outside really understand the extent of it. That this is how we live. I don‚Äôt blame them, I find it hard to believe such a situation exists in the UK in 2021. I do however blame @EnvAgency  & @RedIndustries2 for allowing it to happen #StopTheStink
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency The EA would respond as an emergency to this many complaints of flood water invading homes. What on earth does it take to have this viewed as an emergency?

Disgusting that this is being allowed to happen. Mathew is one of many suffering with mental and/or physical health due to #WalleysQuarry #stopthestink @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/65P2Q6Q9I9

tweets.text: 4 mths ago the Stink visited us for the 1st time. 3 mths ago I rang @EnvAgency angry that I couldnt open windows at night. 2 mths ago my calls were about solid walls of gas outside my home. 1 mth ago calls to @EnvAgency were about smarting eyes, headaches, AND NOW I JUST WEEP.

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA this is bloody ridiculous we have a full on gas onslaught again tonight from @WalleysL got serious heart palpitations again & a blinding headache. Do you care? Do you bugger üò°. Happy Mayday as it won't be for us. #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off

The British Government need to clean this mess up @BorisJohnson Its clearly far beyond the abilities of @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency Send an organ grinder down. We are fed up with your monkeys @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/xdXSqpSHSi

tweets.text: @scottdegg @StinkStopthe @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Where were the strong objections from Newcastle Councillors when @RedIndustries2 were applying to tip 60% more waste 2 years ago? Now the local elections are looming they are making a noise and small efforts. They must think we are stupid. They have failed this community.

Landfill sites need to go, they are a widespread problem! Our friends in #Newcastleunderlyme are being subjected to the same tortuous odour! @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @daera_ni 

#airpollution #airquality #Belfast #lisburn #newcastleunderlyme #silverdale @EnvAgency https://t.co/er4meRnUeR

Judging by social media it‚Äôs another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. üò¢ü§¢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

My kitchen, 2 miles away and up a hill from #WalleysQuarry, in Keele has suddenly been filled with the smell of landfill! @EnvAgencyMids sort it out! This is now a human rights issue! People can't enjoy their own homes. #StopTheStink

So it begins. 
Landfill fumes in the house making me want to wretch ü§Æü§Æ
Daily sprint to switch the air purifier to max speed. 
Godspeed friends
 @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @BorisJohnson #stopthestink https://t.co/thf7BpgQBr

tweets.text: You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

Back home last night. House is full of landfill gas, think i lost my waters, started contractions again and now I‚Äôm back on delivery suite. I AM 30 WEEKS! Fuming with @RedIndustries2 right now. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids

@hopeternalall @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK Early night tonight 9pm & the stench has already invade our homes making us vomit, we all need evacuating to place with clean air, will sleep in car rather than suffer this, @AaronBell4NUL find us a safe refuge #stopthestink

@StinkStopthe @carol_denton @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL If this was water seeping into homes, you can bet the @EnvAgency  would be there dealing with it in an instant. #outofsightoutofmind

Absolute shambles.

tweets.text: So on @StaffordshireCC #StaffordshireDay we went to CHESHIRE to get relief from the plague of Newcastle, #WalleysQuarrey home of #walleyslandfillLTD We looked at houses. Moving away after 41 years, and teaching and raising a family here, now seems the only option @EnvAgencyMids

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency I assume you‚Äôve seen the letter circulating social media from a paediatrician confirming the landfill gases are affecting a little boy called Matthew. üëá. This is serious, more and more people are coming forward with symptoms. This is a health crisis. #stopthestink https://t.co/6RCRCKpGJF

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Worst most intense smell ever tonight, surely a major incident happening, what on earth do the do after dark at weekends, something very wrong going on at walleys quarry ltd formerly @RedIndustries2, @ClareDinnisEA not good enough #stopthestink
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Do you want to add Keele Bank & Paris Avenue Area to the list

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It's not just bad it is totally out of control something very serious must have happed at the site to cause these extremes of gases. It feels literally like a wall and it is extremely scary @StinkStopthe

@AaronBell4NUL What a time to be alive & struggling to breath  @ClareDinnisEA are you willing to let the bodies pile high in Newcastle under Lyme @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk when will you see the growing environment & health issues? You know this is wrong @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Are you aware that the emergency number as advertised on the #WalleysQuarry signage goes to voicemail? Is this a permit breach? How can that be allowed?! It's getting beyond a joke... Unbelievable ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Dr. Neil Carman, published a study (2001) that concluded growing children are more vulnerable to hydrogen sulphide because they breathe more rapidly, taking in significantly more pollution than adults. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe over 30 mins at 5 ppb INDOORS.

The capping was supposed to address the outrageous levels of odour we have endured recently. If it turns out that it has not, it strengthens the case for:

(a) capping off the entire site
(b) moving to the restoration phase
(c) an inquiry into the EA's handling of the site (2/2)
